author: DenIS318
changes: Security Voucher supply crate's amount 4 => 3
Prison cell timers no longer says "NO DATA" and doesn't display admin-observer names
Now displays cryo wake up message when spawned on cryo pod, instead of default arrival message
Prisoners latejoin spawns at cryopods in permabrig, instead of appearing from nowhere
Dormitory vendor (CozyMate) no longer spawn on permabrig
Prisoners no longer spawn with any loadout, only with outfit
Prisoner is now colored at NTTC radio
Prisoner processing console UI height 500 => 540
SS1984 changes are now hightlighted in changelogs

author: DenIS318
changes: Fixed issues with broken say messages + no radio on machinery

author: Arceniu
changes: Added new vendor-with sleep suits and bedsheets
NTR trim now have CentcomBlue color big pointer

author: DenIS318
changes: Revert: Removed 'His Grace' from the Traitor uplink. It was a chaplain traitor only item that required you to consume 25 player corpses to ascend, making you inmune to stuns, regen life and putting you in a timer to kill as many people possible. (upstream #5777)
Bridge Officer no longer available to station
Added safe to HOS office with unica-6 in it with 3 speedloaders + holster for all recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Icebox, Tram)
Added safe codes to HOS office for all recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Icebox, Tram)

author: DenIS318
changes: Engineering Secure Storage button is added to all recommended maps (delta, meta, icebox, tram)
Revert: making detective role more unique, by removing crew pinpointer and detective scanner from their closets, preventing abuse this by officer's. (upstream #4464)
Detective scanner is added to HOS closet
Armory access no longer required to open security MOD room, now it's brig access. For all supported maps (Delta, Meta, Icebox, Tram)
Added oxygen canister to armory on recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Icebox, Tram)
Modular computers (PDA) now shows message when shutdown by powerloss
Modular computers (PDA) powerloss now triggering itself when cell charge's ends
Russian human female lastnames generation

author: DenIS318
changes: Plasma inflation mechanic for cargo. TL;DR: the more plasma you send rapidly, the less it worth.
Plasma sells at cargo now calculate new prices & revenue by curve similar to Log2(x)
Plasma price recovers in 15 mins (if there's no sells, if there's any plasma cell - timer stops and start again, but from current price)
Current plasma cost is displayed at cargo console UI
Plasma inflation works only for cargo shuttle, no away ghots roles/pirates
More detailed description & formulas & graphs are attached in pull request Excel file
Example: 50 plasma worth ~3200 credits, before worth 4000. And 1000 plasma (sold rapidly) worth ~8000 credits, before worth 80000
All simplemobs stamina slowdown reduced 3 => 2, except spiders
For spiders, flesh spiders stamina slowdown reduced 12 => 1
Hunter slug damage multiplier for compatible targets 5=>4, base damage still 20
Hunter Slugs no longer deals damage twice to compatible targets
Kiboko grenades projectiles speed increased 0.5 => 0.9 (normal projectile speed is 1.25)
NTTC at telecomms no longer works if machine is depowered/broken/EMP (comms blackout count as EMP)
SSD players no longer get considered for antag role in midround dynamic rulesets
Map vote now highlight recommended maps (Delta, Meta, Tram, Icebox) - these maps have up-to-date mapping
Highlighted options in vote displayed at top

author: DenIS318
changes: Dynamic rulesets now should correctly work based on enemies per threat, most rulesets require at least 1 enemy (security/captain)
Agent card "select all" and "deselect all" buttons now should correctly work
All midround antag rulesets except sentient disease and borers now require at least 1 enemy (security/heads) for lowpop. Some rulesets require more than 1.

Midround antags rulesets now require at least 5 players, for which they didn't required already. This includes: Syndicate Sleeper, Obsessed. And relevant latejoins. If you want such antagonists at all - you need at least 1 security (captain would fit as well)
Changes for minimum players for other rulesets, such as nuclear assault, wizard, etc...
Quiet ruleset now cost 0.1 threat instead of 0.00001...
Abandoned crates no longer can be hacked using screwdriver-multitool-wirecutter
Now you can see/set security notes/status and other records on yourself if you have relevant HUD.
Now can correctly set status/some other HUD related actions during softcrit
Now during changing security status with SecHUD comment can be added. Automatically adds all such actions it to crime history
revert Nova's Max message length 2048 -> 1024 (as it is in TG)
Added handgun shoulder holster, works similar as MOD Shoulder Holster, but attaches to suit
Added hotkey for attachable shoulder holster (H by default)
Shoulder holster is added to all security weapon kits (hybrid taser kit, sol pistol...)
Shoulder holster added to biogenerator craft for 200 biomaterial

changes: Brig Prison's Cell Timers reworked
New Cell Timer UI
Support for adding crimes directly in Cell Timer
Cell Timer now work based on prisoner name
Auto status set on sentenced/released by Cell Timer
Auto radio announces on cell timer sentenced/released/reset timer
Telecomms config entries for jail announcements/releases/reset timers
Warrant consoles now prints autogenerated sentences papers when Cell Timer activated
Remove "old" Cell Timer UI

author: DenIS318
changes: Stunprod knockdown time 1.5 seconds => 1 tick (~0.05 seconds). There's still time after knockdown received to get up regardless of knockdown_time)
Stunprod size HUGE => NORMAL (can fit in backpack now)
Taser no longer apply tased status effect (no slowdown)
Taser no longer drain cell energy and stamina after hit target
Taser stamina damage 35 => 15
Taser delay between shots 0 => 15 ticks (~0.75 seconds)
Taser range 5 => 7
Taser paralyze 0 => 0.2 seconds (kind of microstun or ranged disarm)
Taser energy cost reduced, 5 => 15 shots with default battery
Taser no longer shows visual beam effect (by default)
Security roles (exclude detective and department guards) spawn with Security Voucher
Security Voucher can be used on SecTech to get Taser or Sol Pistol with non-lethal ammo

Security vouchers can be purchased at cargo

author: DenIS318
changes: Secure closets and crates can be hacked now with tools. Follow order: screwdriver => wirecutter => multitool. There is a chance to fail on each step.
